Articles.Content:
Had a crash on clean vanilla install unmodded of KSP...

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/p91ss2hhzppxke8/AAAnLy72SyYl-klP8Wxffo02a?dl=0

 

System specs:

Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 64bit

Core i5 2500K (unclocked)

Gigabyte GA-Z68XP-UD3 (BIOS F-10)

G-Skill 8GB DDR3 RAM

XFX HD Radeon 7870DD 256bit 2GB (Crimson 16.1 drivers)

Sound Blaster X-Fi Xtreme Gamer

Seagate 1TB SATA-2 (OS install)

Hitachi 1TB SATA-3 (FSX drive)

WD SATA-3 (Steam game drive)

LG Blue Ray Buner DL

Antec 650w PSU

Rosewill Challenger mid tower

Edited February 7, 2016 by udidwht
update
Thanks udidwht, unfortunately there's nothing in the files to say what caused this, KSP is known to crash occasionally so if this was a one-off all you can do is restart and carry on.
